name: Family Games Compendium
overview: Midas Interactive re-released some of their games as Family Games Compendium, that is a collection of 20 family games over 3 disks. The gambling games were also released as Vegas Casino & Card Shark. In this compilation CD 1 = Vegas Casino, CD 2 = Card Shark. The third cd in the compilation features 3 different racing games: 1 - Kart Racer: Released also as Kart Challenge 2 - Superbike Challenge: Released also as Sports Superbike. 3 - Power G.P.: Released as GP Challange. All the games are: Baccarat Blackjack Concentration (Each player takes it in turn over their cards and find pairs. whoever has most pairs at the end wins.) Power GP (F1-esque racing) Kart Racer Keno Let it Bet (based on poker, you try making a hand based on 3 of your cards and 2 of the dealer's) Old Maid (a.k.a old man) Page One Poker Rich Man (similar to the card game beat your neighbor) Roulette Seven Bridges Seven in a Row Slot Machine Speed Superbike Challenge Super Blackjack Splash Video Poker
